gameName: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered
reports_summary: In one submission, The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered on a Steam Deck OLED felt mixed: performance generally sits in the low 30s with drops below 30 that make heavier scenes choppy but not crash-prone. Using the FSR performance upscaler helps keep frame rates closer to the target, while frame generation was reported to worsen the feel and is best left off. Power draw ran around 23 W, which corresponds to roughly two hours of battery life in this configuration.
